  • public class GeneralConfigAction
extends BaseConfigAction
    GeneralConfigAction - Struts action to handle updating config values from the satellte General Config page.

      • translateFormPropertyName

        public static java.lang.String translateFormPropertyName(java.lang.String configKey)
        Key munging method to replace the DOTs in the key with |'s This is because Struts will attempt to turn any form property that contains dot notation into a bean and then use BeanUtils to inquire about properties of that bean. For form properties that are not a bean, this causes null/empty values to be returned.
        Parameters:
        configKey - to replace periods with bars
        Returns:
        String with |s instead of .s

      • getCommandClassName

        protected java.lang.String getCommandClassName()
        Subclasses implement this to indicate the name of the class to use when fetching the Command instance
        Specified by:
        getCommandClassName in class BaseConfigAction
        Returns:
        String classname
